; On day 10, we give out 50 credits, and a random item (weapon or armour) for
; players level. This uses the 'weeklyreward' drop rate profile to determine the rarity
; and stats. This has a high chance of rare, and a low chance of an epic.
10	0	999	7861	VIRTUAL	2:weeklyreward:ANY
10	0	999	7861	CREDITS	50
